response.explain: The task is to cook bacon. Currently, the bacon is inside the fridge which is not currently opened. The fridge is not within the 1-meter range of the robot. The original subtasks are not provided. So, the agent needs to plan from the scratch. The first step for the agent should be to move near the fridge. Followed by this, it needs to open the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move near to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Grasp the bacon from the fridge
(4) Move near to the stove
(5) Cook the bacon on the stove
response.code:
